content: these small creatues are called junimos and are apple shaped helpers in a game called stardew valley they are so cute in their vibrant colors so i just had to try to make them myself this is my first ever pattern woho and i d like to share it with you since this is my first pattern there is probably some stuff that is hard to completely understand or might even be wrong don t hesitate to give me a hint on this and i might get better in the future please share your projects with me here or on instagram using @madebytollow or #madebytollow love this community regards jonatan tollow
